column1: The Purple Pig////Now that I have got all of that out of my system
column2: let me tell you why The Purple Pig gets 4 stars anyway. The food at this restaurant is fantastic guys
column3: literally everything we tried was delicious
column4: you must try their grilled broccoli and the duck confit
column5: both best in their class. The drinks were good but we missed the joy of having our moscow mule in a copper cup.
